text: 1.20: Jop 12.17; Ais 19.12; 33.18; 44.25; Mt 11.25; Ru 10.21; Ro 1.20-21; 1.28Ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ki gumgi maaŋ ki? Moses suaŋgi tɨvir vhuuiŋ sure muuŋgi gumgi maaŋ ki? Kha nuianan ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ kav ŋkasŋkagiap buni nzuav harigi gumgi buni daasuav mbe kambai gumgi maaŋ ki? Fhe Bakɨme kha nuianan gumgir ndɨkndɨgi gum mbe nzuai buni, ana za nta mbuim, nta fhura shɨkshɨgap tamtam nzuai buni ma.
